website_summaries.verdict: The Creative Outlier Air earphones offer solid true wireless audio and good battery life for less than $100.
pros: Powerful bass depth and crisp, sculpted highs
cons: Audio isn't for those seeking an accurate sound signature

customer_reviews.title: Mixed feelings
customer_reviews.text: So first off these are comfortable in some ways. But they missed a trick with not including different size tips. For me they go far to deep into your ear canal. Someone like me that suffers with build up with wax etc... I normally use the larger tips for earphones so they don't lodge everything back into my ear. Also unfortunately while the phone in my pocket I had cracking and break up in the right bud every few minutes. The good. Very good quality feeling with a cool case. Also the sound is the best I've come across. Incredible sound for Earphones. Wanted to love them but unfortunately the couple flaws for me didn't make them worth it
customer_reviews.author: Reuben

customer_reviews.title: Fail.
customer_reviews.text: Terrible fit. After reading and watching all the reviews, these looked ideal, but you will need the ear canal dimensions of a field mouse. You can't change the earbuds to something bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Fan

customer_reviews.title: Great when they work, but terrible build quality.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing overall. When they work they're fantastic. They have great sound quality, the battery life is amazing and they're super comfortable. However, I ordered a pair and the left bud broke within a week (I have since found out this is a common problem). I returned these and on the second pair I have received the back of the left ear popped off and there is no way to fix it back in place. Support is slow to get back too. Also, they cut out when there are many Bluetooth users around (e.g. train stations). Overall they are great when they work but it feels like corners were cut when it comes to build quality.
customer_reviews.author: Ben Longhurst

customer_reviews.title: ear fit
customer_reviews.text: Just started to use these for the first time as a Christmas gift and was experimenting to find the correct fitting rubber ear grommets and when I took them out of my ear initially thought one had come off the end of the pods but after searching the floor noticed a numbness in my left ear, my partner checked inside me ear cannel and found that the rubber had become lodged in the ear itself and had to very carefully remove with a pair of tweezers, not a very nice experience so just warning anyone who is trying these to be very carefull
customer_reviews.author: mikeyboy

customer_reviews.title: The best fitting headphone for runners I have ever tried
customer_reviews.text: At last I have found some ear pods that stay in my ears when running and cycling. Great sound and good battery life. Two negatives, but they don't outweigh the surprisingly amazing ear fast fit. 1. The buttons on the earpieces are really hard to press while in you ear, because they have a stiff a mechanism. This is good in that you don't accidentally click them, however they are so hard that I generally would avoid using them to control volume and only when you really want to advance the track. 2. It a little tricky getting the headphones out of the charger box. Pretty minor and getting better at it now ;-)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones, rubbish case.
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality for the price. Comfortable and secure, can wear them for hours. People seem to have some difficulty hearing me during calls in anything other than a silent environment. Issues with charging case. Feels cheap and poorly designed. Headphones do not always lock into charging pods which is fiddly and irritating. If it runs out of battery the headpones go into active mode and start trying to connect. There is very poor low charge warning on the case. Edit: Changed to two star as the button cap over the left bud has now come away (I hadn't been using these for a while, so it seems to just have deteriorated). Build quality isn't good.
customer_reviews.author: B. Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Budget price, decent sound
customer_reviews.text: Well for the money this isn't too bad at all, the sound quality is pretty decent for this price point, it handles pretty much all genres very well, I listen to a lot of bass heavy music with my own custom bass and treble equaliser and it handles it very well. Appearance wise is very smart, I love the slide out design, you get different ear tips and they fit me perfect and provide decent passive noise cancellation. These last a long time on battery.
customer_reviews.author: Sofir Uddin

customer_reviews.title: Great battery and quality. Minor problems charging the buds
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Great battery Great audio Really Comfortable Fantastic Value Cons: I'd say the battery is more 6-7hrs than 10. Also they're quiet. They don't get loud in loud environments they don't get loud enough at all. Also the buttons really are bad they wedge right in your ear it's too uncomfortable. They take so much fiddling around to get to charge in the case! Edit: I upgraded my phone to OnePlus 7 Pro and the battery has improved massively. Also better connection too. So I dunno why my Oppo just hated these buds.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: Premium buds at budget price
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as my first pair of buds so didn't want to break bank in case I didn't like them. These were at the top end of the budget options so I wasn't getting my hopes up, but have been really impressed. The design is really slick, they fit well and sound quality is excellent. Plus battery life is exceptional. It doesn't seem to like being paired to more than one device at a time, so having to reset each time I want to change the paired device, but other than that no real complaints. These buds feel and perform premium but at a budget price. Great value. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Mani

customer_reviews.title: Sound great but Creative need to be a bit more generous!
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality and fit, charging case holds enough power to last most of the day. Only complaint is that it is difficult to get aftermarket ear tips, not found any brand that will reliably fit properly or dont need removing to fit in the case and considering you only get one pair of each of the two sizes included! If you want replacements from creative they charge £5 per pair for a teeny bit of silicon rubber that is very flimsy and easy to lose!
customer_reviews.author: decyther

customer_reviews.title: Faulty after one month
customer_reviews.text: Had it for 1 month and now right one is fuzzy and can't stay connected if any movement at all! Really enjoyed them before fault but shame as won't buy again! Update: Receiving replacement from Creative so the customer service is impressive as they got back to me very quickly! Hopefully the next pair are as impressive as the first pair were in the first month
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Breen

customer_reviews.title: Music is good , chatting on the phone not so good
customer_reviews.text: Sadly I wanted some decent earbuds to talk on as well as listen to music. Sadly they didn't do a great job , speaking in a quiet kitchen the person on the other end was asking what I was doing sounded like banging pans. Not great for talking on the phone other than that for music they sounded good. Also I left my phone upstairs and the Bluetooth signal was lost this isn't far at all was expecting better
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Good headphones
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these after trying a few cheaper versions from other brands (which all had to be returned as the quality was awful) and am very pleased with them - they fit securely in my ears and the sound is very good. I haven’t had any issues with losing connection between them and my phone, and would definitely recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Cara Goss

customer_reviews.title: Not fit for purpose
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking, good sound and great tech specs. However the headphones constantly drop in and out, totally unusable. I'm on my second pair after Creative replaced the first pair. Looks to be a known issue with this product with no fix available. These are not cheap headphones, I'll be asking for a full refund
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: FREEDOM AT LAST
customer_reviews.text: What a blessing they are, I walk almost every day and with the cable constantly getting tangled up with my phone when listening to music, it used to drive me insane. Now it's a pleasure to go out Nordic Walking without constantly having to re-adjust the ear-phone buds as they fell out. I am amazed that they stay put without any movement what so ever, I wore them for a two-hour walk without any discomfort and the need for any adjustments were a thing of the past, the sound is rich and deep and the pairing/set-up was a walk in the park, unlike some systems that are constantly losing their connection. What do I like about this product, everything!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ray Kazemzadeh

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality and connectivity is very good. When using the phone at the same time there is occasional interference however, when just relaxing there are no issues. They look good and the charging pod is nice. Slightly larger than similar devices for keeping in a pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs P

customer_reviews.title: Great value, comfort and sound
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the earbuds, spent some time researching what were the best available at a price I could afford and these were consistently reviewed well. I had bought some more expensive buds from another brand but had to send them back as one was faulty, to be honest the sound was no better than these, despite costing over £100. Having bought the Creative Outliers I am not disappointed. Super comfy, great seal makes them almost like noise cancelling ear buds! Good sound quality and no complaints with battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Man from Surrey

customer_reviews.title: EXASPERATING!!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best in ear head phones I've heard....one problem you only get to hear 20 seconds of music before they drop out.... REALLY P****d off big time with these,you just want to hear the wonderful music they can produce, but they drop out constantly...if they have fixed this problem as some suggest,Creative must have sent me a pair of someone elses's returned duds,these headphones are lucky to have escaped a 20lb lump hammer they are so exasperating Creative have a chance to be up there with the best in sound reproduction...but they cant sort out a stable bluetooth connection.......waste of money
customer_reviews.author: JOHN LEWIS

customer_reviews.title: Poor connection
customer_reviews.text: The item was packaged well and fitted well in the ear. The charging case was a good size and very sturdy. The only reason they were returned was the signal kept dropping from my phone giving a poor connection. I have a pair at £10 from Wish that performed 100 times better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Need more control via Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: They are really good but whenever I want to hear the sound on Facebook I get iTunes playing or music I have downloaded and no amount of button pushing will get it to change channels, you need a control in the Bluetooth panel to enable to change channels. I haven’t tried it with a phone as yet. But I am pleased with the product not withstanding my moans.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. C. T. Astrand

customer_reviews.title: The connection could be better.
customer_reviews.text: They look great actually. They are very light and the sound quality is above average. More expensive than it should be but the battery life, the high quality case and the brand name all lead to this price. I've had two other TWS that were only slightly cheaper save they both died within three months. I'll see how this fares.
customer_reviews.author: Django

customer_reviews.title: Excellent IEMs for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price I'm highly impressed by the quality of these earphones. They're comfortable, lightweight, have a decent range (was able to head downstairs to make a cup of tea with no dropoff), and the design is pretty sleak. I do find the highs a slight bit muddy, but it's something you can easily get used to. If you want some bassy wireless earbuds at a decent price, I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Really great headphones
customer_reviews.text: In certain positions or head tilts the signal may cutoff, but only experineced this a few times. Also the headphone holder/magnet could be better and it becomes a struggle to place the buds back in or remove. Amazing battery life and they fit very snug. Easy to adjust. Did not mind the physical button being so hard, which is preferable than the touch buttons that tend to break after some usage.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper man

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: These are amazing! One of two problem was that the delivery takes a long time - even if you have prime, but that wasnt too much of an issue. The other is that the call quality is really bad - not sure why, it comes across usable on mobile calls but on anything data based it is awful. Additionaly if they become uncomfortable if you use it for more than two hours. Everything else on the other hand is great and would definetley purchase again as the downsides dont affect me much.
customer_reviews.author: Hamid

customer_reviews.title: Great value for money
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and set up. Sound quality is fine as is battery life. Still getting used to the fit but I’m sure that will be fine too. However, the big plus on these is what you get for your money. They are as good as other types three times the price.
customer_reviews.author: Carol K

customer_reviews.title: simply superb for the price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using more expensive headphones which i broke, so wanted something which had recieved good reviews, the most important thing for me is sound quality. and WOW these are as good as my Senheiser momentum 2 over ear which were £300 at the time. Superb sound with good base which is not booming but perfect, crisp highs and mids, comfortable, superb battery life at 30 hours, and good build...for £69 you cannot go wrong
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: When you buy something for over £90 you expect it to keep working after 6 months
customer_reviews.text: Bought these wireless earbuds with the idea that they would last a lot longer than cheap wired in-ears that tend to break or tear. I WAS WRONG. 6 months in (with not that much use) and the device has serious issues connecting to the Bluetooth (Microphone isn't recognised) and the right earbud's button fell off. If you're looking for reliable tech, look somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Gundy

customer_reviews.title: These are excellent.
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a lot of Bluetooth earphones and never found a pair that fit without stress and stay comfortable for ages. These sound great and do everything right - if you remember to 'wind them slightly backwards' once they're in your ears (there's a short Creative video on YouTube) they'll fit really well. Recommended - and the sound is fantastic for the price.
customer_reviews.author: awholenewview

customer_reviews.title: Good sound, poor fitting
customer_reviews.text: The sound overall of the earbuds were extremely good. I didn't experience any dropouts in the sound which was surprising considering they require bluetooth. The only issue for me is the fit. They do fall out a few times and it just doesn't look right. I have small ears so it doesn't fit flat in my ears and sticks out quite a bit which is why they will be returned
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous1

customer_reviews.title: Good sound quality when they work, but plagued with frequent dropouts/connectivity issues.
customer_reviews.text: First pair worked fine for a couple of weeks, after that the sound output of the right (slave) unit became very weak when compared to the left, this persisted even after reset or if paired with other devices. I contacted Creative Labs and they promptly offered to replace it, they sent me a new pair after a couple of weeks. Unfortunately, the new pair has connectivity issues with frequent dropouts of the slave unit. During calls sometimes the sound from the secondary unit is distorted. When they work as intended (and if you choose the right size rubber tip) the sound is great, but still I can't recommend them as I tried two different pairs and they both had issues.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Unbeatable at this price
customer_reviews.text: These are undoubtedly the best wireless earbuds available at this price range, and their performance puts up a fight to £100+ models from the likes of B&O and Cambridge Audio. They are not noise cancelling but do fit very snugly and block out alot most ambient noises.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after update to android 10
customer_reviews.text: I have a Oneplus 6 and the earbuds stopped working after updating to android 10, they connect (sometimes) but volume is all over the place, tried to change protocol and all the possible options but still nothing, also left earbud volume is always lower than the left and there's nothing I can do to change that, even after resetting them as soon as I connect them the volume goes out of sync. Shame as they were good.
customer_reviews.author: Gianpa

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: These are my second unit. The first, the right bud’s volume disappeared. This unit, kindly sent as a replacement worked fine until the battery needed charging.... it won’t. I’ve had it on charge 4 time’s now with different ports and still nothing. Useless
customer_reviews.author: Gill Waterhouse

customer_reviews.title: great sound but bad conectivity
customer_reviews.text: the problem they have is that if you are moving ,they are loosing the conectuvity which is bad, that's the reason why I'm returning them.the thing is that if you want to use them standing, the sound is very good, much better than some expensive ones
customer_reviews.author: hristo

customer_reviews.title: Great sounding True Wireless Earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these buds. Fantastic sound, great isolating fit, super comfortable and secure in my ears. I don't miss the features you don't get compared to Apple Airpods etc. These are better for an Android phone and for the money are a steal.
customer_reviews.author: Monty

customer_reviews.title: Best in ears with only one issue!
customer_reviews.text: These are quite easily the best pair of truly wireless in ears you can get for below £100. Sound quality and bass is fantastic. The only real issue that pretty much every one will notice is that the clickable buttons on the sides are quite stiff and you have to press down a fair bit which can be uncomfortable or painful. I highly recommend not using these buttons at all and simply using the phone / smartwatch to control music playback.
customer_reviews.author: Aishwarya Singh

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed considering the price.
customer_reviews.text: Very very disappointing. Pairing was awful on the IPhone, would not disconnect when placed back in the holder. The buttons were very hard to press and pushed into the ear causing discomfort. Expected more for the price you pay.
customer_reviews.author: Dominik

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant earphones
customer_reviews.text: I am delighted with my purchase. They fit me perfectly and are highly effective in cancelling out noise around me. The battery life is impressive and the quality of their output is to my mind first rate. All in all an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Ian Lane

customer_reviews.title: Good earphones, but fall out when running
customer_reviews.text: I like these earphones a lot, and the charging case works really nicely. My only criticisms are that I haven't yet figured out how to skip tracks using the earphones, and that I find them to be unstable when I run (so can't use them running).
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Bluetooth earphones, excellent battery life, great value
customer_reviews.text: I use these earphones everywhere! They are perfect for commuting and going to the gym as they cancel out background noise well, and sit comfortably in the ear without feeling like they will fall out. I usually dislike in-ear styles but these are a little shallower and comfortable for hours. The sound quality is great, and the battery lasts forever. The charging case is a convenient size, easy to slip into a pocket, and durable enough to take a few drops. Pairs seamlessly with my iPhone and laptop, and I have had no issues with connectivity, even in rush hour trains. My only gripe would be the extremely short charging cable provided. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: uncomfy in the ears
customer_reviews.text: These were really hard on the ears you have to push the sensors on the headset hard to get next track hurts your ears plus I read great reviews about the sound really loud but breaks up and the bass is not as good as the Athens all in all big disappointment was expecting a lot more the way the reviews were going on not bad not great very average and not great sound.
customer_reviews.author: leslie

customer_reviews.title: Getting what I have paid for.
customer_reviews.text: The sound are very poor, no bass at all, you have to 👂 on maximum the listening the music. So spenseev and yet very very poor. I'm already trying it, maybe the battery are okay but the sound are very poor. Thanks you Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Rendeiro da Silva

customer_reviews.title: Broke in under a week with 0 water exposure/drops etc
customer_reviews.text: Apparently my shoulder is too much for the bluetooth in these headsets to handle. Also my ears feel like they're being assaulted whenever I put these earphones in. Sound is good, but mids are basically non-existent. Edit: left side broken already: Speaker broken so sending back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't work with Teams/Zoom etc.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these earphones primarily to use instead of a cumbersome headset when on video meetings. However, they don't work in this situation - most of the time I just scratchy interference noises. If I'm lucky, they will work for a few minutes and then stop. Oddly, they work perfectly fine for listening to music or watching movies on the same device as the video meetings. Also work fine with my phone. So, if I'd never tried using them for video meetings, I would think they were great - as it is, I'm a bit disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: AV

customer_reviews.title: Constant dropouts
customer_reviews.text: The frequent dropout of the slave earphone ruined the listening experience. This is a shame as the sound quality was excellent in between the dropouts. I had them for 48 hrs, tried resetting them and also changing devices, to no avail, so had no option but to send them back to Amazon. To Creative: Why don’t you do something about fixing the BT connectivity problem once and for all, rather then sending a stock reply to customers who complain about it? Your pursuit of excellent sound quality in these earphones is being completely undermined by it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worthy of the great reviews
customer_reviews.text: I like my headphones having 5 sets of varying types. These sound great. Never fall out. The tight ear fit can make my ears itch after 30 minutes, but you need a good seal for the sound. I have found the Creative support very prompt and helpful when I lost an ear bud.
customer_reviews.author: Anteric

customer_reviews.title: Not for me
customer_reviews.text: They are not very comfortable, I found them a bit big. When you use them you can’t hear anything around you, which is not very good I believe. Microphone is very bad, I mostly needed for calls, but the person on the other side couldn’t hear me. Item returned very quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bery good but dodgey charging
customer_reviews.text: Had these a few months now and overall i am happy with them. The sound quality is good and loud and they are definatley splashproof having worn them in a hottub. Where they let you down is in the charging. Sometimes only one charges as the other is trying to connect to a phone. Often it takes 5 minutes or more fiddling about to get them both to charge. This is a pain in the ass and if it wasnt for this they would of got a much higher rating. If you can get over that i would reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin

customer_reviews.title: Mediocre
customer_reviews.text: I wanted these to be better, but with connection issues, fit issues, and mediocre sound quality - they just never met my expectations. The battery is good though. Also, the battery case is fragile - I dropped it once and it got all scratched up.
customer_reviews.author: Hawk

customer_reviews.title: Good battery life but poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: The battery life is great with these. I could go a week without having to charge the box. However, the build quality is not great. The black buttons you use to control the headphones fell off one bud after about 4 months. They are very hard to refit and eventually got lost. This leaves the internal workings of the headphones exposed and vulnerable. I will not be buying a replacement pair.
customer_reviews.author: Ollie

customer_reviews.title: Good earbuds.
customer_reviews.text: If fitting to ear is good (you need to experiment) , the earbuds are very good indeed, well worth the money. However, the left earbud seems not as loud as the right one but can be corrected via the tablet or pc.
customer_reviews.author: gg

customer_reviews.title: Great value!
customer_reviews.text: Was frightened that I might not like this style of earphone or that I might lose them so didn’t want most expensive. Bought cheap ones before and they were rubbish - didn’t hold their charge at all. These were mid-price but they are superb. Good quality sound and fit, hold their charge well - 5 days in gym between charges - recharge in their case even when not plugged in. Pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Michael McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Average
customer_reviews.text: Not brilliant but not Bad either. Just average ear buds. Not really loud enough without distorting.
customer_reviews.author: CHIPMUNK39

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sounds
customer_reviews.text: Stunned by the sound quality absolutely astounding for wireless buds . Battery life is as it claims and easily lasts 8 hours on 1 charge ,pop it in the charger and away you go again ! Comfortable enough to wear but given 4 stars because of the clunky controls
customer_reviews.author: floyd59

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing - problems whilst working out.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones look great, and have the specifications but lack in the quality of life aspects. Build quality is not as solid as it appears (pressing the buttons is quite an uncomfortable experience when they're in your ear). Ultimately returned as the headphones kept on cutting out despite my phone being only approximately 50cm away in my pocket whilst running.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 2 months
customer_reviews.text: These were great until2 months in when the right earpiece went muffled... The charging box does n't have the serial number on, so no way of getting support from Creative.... Absolute waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Rob

customer_reviews.title: LEFT a lot to be desired
customer_reviews.text: Initially I was really pleased with these but within a few days of indoor use, the left earbud began to fade in volume and no matter how much i charged it, the sound never returned. I contacted Amazon who, in turn, asked Creative for some advice - but none was forthcoming. So I reluctantly returned them - which took up a lot of time and caused no small amount of hassle. I'm awaiting a full refund.
customer_reviews.author: Ben McFarland

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound but needed changes
customer_reviews.text: Earphones have good quality sound but only after I replaced the almost useless silicon buds with better foam ones. This is the only way to get the good sound and deep bass.
customer_reviews.author: Adam M Forster

customer_reviews.title: Great earbuds for on the go.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic earbuds, great sound and battery life for the money. I wear them commuting with no issues. I don't use the earbuds themselves for volume, track change, etc, as I prefer to use my phone for controlling.
customer_reviews.author: Mick

customer_reviews.title: Started falling apart and having software issues in less than a a month.
customer_reviews.text: These headphones have so much potential, but just like the outlier airs these have the exact same issues. The button coverings fall off, they have the same connection problems and they also have the same volume problems as the air too. Thought the premium version might have actually fixed the problems of the originals frankly. Fix your build quality and quality control and you would have some excellent headphones creative.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick Armour

customer_reviews.title: Gave me ear ache. Lots of interference.
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is not that good and they are really uncomfortable to wear. Battery life is very good though but suffer from interference often making them useless.
customer_reviews.author: Hiro Protagonist

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is excellent, battery life is excellent,looks quite big in my ears but with sound and battery as good as they are I can live with that and the price is a bargain for something with a 2year life expectancy I could not spend £140/160 just t last a couple of years
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Stephen White

customer_reviews.title: Started out perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in February. Earphones have progressively gone quieter and there are constant conection issues. I was expecting better quality and longevity from a company that's been at the top end of the field for nearly forty years. Let's hope next version is better.
customer_reviews.author: Geoff

customer_reviews.title: Very bad bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.text: These are very bad. The bluetooth constantly keeps dropping. Ive done a master reset 20 times now and im returning these. Its not my phone or device as we’ve tried it on 3 other phones and the same problem occurs.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Great in general with a few drawbacks
customer_reviews.text: A very very nice sound , loud as hell, although it's difficult to find an app for these , and the physical button is really hard to press. Other than that , they work perfect :) also great lookers
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Decent earbuds
customer_reviews.text: Sound is ok for the price range but it's not very rich. To hear the punchy bass you need to listen to a higher volume. Noise cancellacion is 0, battery is very good. The earbuds are a little sketchy and it's too bad that there is no available memory foam buds to use
customer_reviews.author: povidiu

customer_reviews.title: Great budget true wireless earbuds
customer_reviews.text: After one month of using these regularly, I am still thoroughly impressed with the quality of these earphones. For a budget range wireless earphone, they have surprisingly good clarity. Obviously, this isn't as bassy or crisp as some of the more expensive ones on the market, but does the job very well for the price. The only slight let down is occasionally the connection will be a bit temperamental if your device is in some deep pockets.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Goldsworthy

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't connect to my phone
customer_reviews.text: Unable to pair with my phone running Android 10 so they were returned. I didn't get to hear them but they felt cheap and nasty to the touch, despite not being that cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Defective earbuds?
customer_reviews.text: Would have been perfect if one earbud didn't stop working after a few hours of listening.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: A great product
customer_reviews.text: Sound quality is absolutely brilliant with a good bass to it, very comfortable even when you are doing intense exercises. Only small issue is the button on the earphones could be more sensitive when pressing especially when it's on the ear because it can hurt if you press to hard - overall a great product for its price, highly recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broke after 5 months...
customer_reviews.text: Good until they broke. I bought these for their battery life, which is excellent, I will say. However, the button which controls the headphones fell off one headphone after 5 months and was starting to come off the second. Thankfully amazon took them back as it was within the manufacturer warranty but I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Christine C.

customer_reviews.title: Pricy but good.
customer_reviews.text: They cost a fair amount of money but I honestly think you get what you pay for. Great sound quality amazing battery life, I'm yet to finish the battery in a single use. They are comfortable and when you sit them in properly they cancel noise really well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to replace a previous set that developed a fault. Hopefully these ones will last a lot longer!
customer_reviews.author: Busy mum

customer_reviews.title: Great value wireless Bluetooth earphones - better than Beats
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting too much from these earphones, but they are amazing, for the price you won’t find a better pair of in ear earphones. The sound quality is great, they stay in your ears fine, no outside noise can be heard. Battery lasts for ages. Thoroughly recommended. Forget overpriced Beats buy these.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Battery life great
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life,connect easily to my android phone and iPad.good bass but not so good on the treble.8/10 still the same.
customer_reviews.author: John W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: I've had these for almost 4 months now and I am really delighted with them. I researched the purchase wanting them for my daily walks of around 7 miles and I have found them to be perfect for my needs. Small, well-fitting with great sound and remarkably good noise cancelling. Great price and battery life. Would heartily recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Turner

customer_reviews.title: Best affordable wireless headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Quality wireless headphones at this price range. Good sound quality and good connection. Great for making calls aswell. The Bottoms are a bit tight and need a firm press but work perfectly. Nice sleek finish on the headphones and case. Little to no issues, highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One side for no reasons stoped working
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds is arrived in perfect condition. I use it for a while maybe week. I must say the sound is perfec to! But over a week last not longer.
customer_reviews.author: Gabor

customer_reviews.title: Gift purchase...very happy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased as a gift for my daughter....very pleased with the ease of use. Charging case is well designed and sturdy..works well for carrying and charging.
customer_reviews.author: elgan

customer_reviews.title: Very impressive little buds
customer_reviews.text: The battery life on these things is amazing, the sound is superb. Even the volume is great, i can't hear anything around me with these in haha.
customer_reviews.author: ceiron

customer_reviews.title: Broke. Returned for refund
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately I had to return after 2 months as one bud stopped working and despite following manufacturers advice on getting it to work again, it still did not. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: D. Nicholls

customer_reviews.title: Far too unreliable! Avoid!
customer_reviews.text: Had to return after five days of use. Constantly dropping, rendering them useless!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not quite there yet as decent product
customer_reviews.text: These didn't work for me. On calls my voice was too quiet. Not comfortable and glad to take them off. Sound quality was good
customer_reviews.author: 92RedFerrari

customer_reviews.title: Good sound marred by terrible connection problems
customer_reviews.text: At first I loved the headphones with the good fit and great sound but the constant cutting out of the right side spoiled it completely. I did a factory reset but the issue remained. Literally every 10 seconds it would cut out so I had to return them Shame as they did have a lot of promise.
customer_reviews.author: scott wilson

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Shipped with one ear bud broken, returns policy is a ball ache its more time efficient to buy another pair - from a different manufacturer. Avoid
customer_reviews.author: jon

customer_reviews.title: Really good earphones
customer_reviews.text: Great product in every conceivable aspect but my only niggle with them was they didn't stay securely fitted in my ears during exercise. I'm sure these will fit other ears perfectly well but I guess my ears are slightly weird 😂
customer_reviews.author: William

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad
customer_reviews.text: that item is not too bad but so many times the connection in lost or interrupted, even in you just keep your phone in the pocket. In call are really bad, u can speak just indoor and even in a quiet room. Are Good just to hear music o watching movies
customer_reviews.author: Diego Di Maio

customer_reviews.title: Great headphones
customer_reviews.text: Perfect sound and quick to connect. Impressive battery life. Would have given five stars, except for very rare stuttering.
customer_reviews.author: Edward Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant headphones with very good battery life
customer_reviews.text: Been thinking of buying these for a while. Wish I brought them sooner as they are brilliant. Battery life is very good, i use them probably a couple of hours a day, 2 weeks later and I still haven't needed to recharge them. Sound quality is good with good bass and set up was extremely easy. Well worth the money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The sweet spot, at last
customer_reviews.text: Finally, a pair of earbuds worth keeping. Quality sound at half-price!
customer_reviews.author: Kiko

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good fit to inner ears, good to run. Very good battery life. Ease of re-charge. Negative: hard to press control whilst wearing ear phones. Have to grab the unit. Overall, good value for product.
customer_reviews.author: burtydude

customer_reviews.title: Good at first but quality drops off super quick
customer_reviews.text: Just coming up to 3 months and unfortunately these are falling apart. The outer button casing has fallen off on both sides due to no misuse and the sound volume and quality in the left bud is more or less gone. Only positive would be the battery life. Can't fault that!
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Good Solid Bass.
customer_reviews.text: Great earphones, great price. Good heavy solid bass and good amount of volume. Didn't seem loud or bassy out of the box but switched over to the slightly larger eartips included and then bass and volume was excellent. Stay in the ears no problem. Worth the money, especially if can get them on sale.
customer_reviews.author: Oreece.

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a friend as a gift. He wanted top quality earphones for a while and came across these. Absolutely loves them.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Curran

customer_reviews.title: Good product but poor fit kills the sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit resulting in poor sound. It only sounds good if the “fit” is right and sits a certain way in your ear. Disappointing. Can I get my money back?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: Excellent fit, the sound is great for the price and the battery life is outstanding. The only problem I found was that the connection struggles when walking with the phone in my pocket (pants), although this problem is solved if I keep the phone in the chest pocket of my jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Marcelo San Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great quality wireless ear phones.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and fits well. The quality of sound is great and will definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Mic

customer_reviews.title: Button cover fell off.
customer_reviews.text: The button cover is poorly designed; it fell off and won't go back on. I would have recommended this product if it was not for that obvious issue.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 all round
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed, sound, comfort and noise cancellation was all 10/10
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Barton

customer_reviews.title: Sound Quality
customer_reviews.text: It is a fantastic product at the right price if tou are looking for a truly wireless headphones with superb sound quality
customer_reviews.author: Joseph kizhakethil

product_meta.title: Creative Outlier Air TWS True Wireless Sweatproof Earphones, Bluetooth 5.0, aptX/AAC, Long Battery Life 30hrs Total, 10hrs Per Charge, Graphene Driver, Dual-Voice Calls, Siri/Google Assistant (Black)
feature_bullets: STUNNING 30 HOURS OF BATTERY LIFE | Boasting a staggering 10-hour playtime and an additional 2X of charges in the USB Type-C charging case, Outlier Air has an incredible total playtime of up to 30 hours, outperforming most competitors. The earbuds charge automatically each time they are placed back in the case for storage. To recharge the case, use the provided USB Type-C cable and connect to any USB Type-A charging port.

LATEST AUDIO TECHNOLOGY | Fitted with the latest driver technology, Outlier Air produces detailed highs, well-balanced mids, and immersive bass with the 5.6mm graphene driver diaphragm. Equipped with the latest Bluetooth 5.0 and aptX/AAC, you can be sure of uncompromised and uninterrupted wireless audio quality.
IPX5 SWEATPROOF | IPX5 water-resistant, Creative Outlier Air can handle all that hard-earned sweat, accidental splashes, and even rain.

TRUE WIRELESS STEREO CALLS AND CONTROLS | Hear audio out of both earbuds when making a call and enjoy convenient access with Outlier Air. Most true wireless headphones can only handle calls in mono; both earbuds of the Outlier Air work independently and are fitted with built-in mics so you can also receive and answer calls even with just one earbud.

SMART ASSISTANT | Access smart assistants like Siri and Google Assistant by pressing twice on the earbud paired as the main unit. Make a call, select a playlist, or turn up the volume control – all it takes is a double press on the button.

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
